name: MTLCommandBufferStatus
desc: The stages in the lifetime of the command buffer.

items.name: case notEnqueued
items.desc: The command buffer is not enqueued yet.

items.name: case committed
items.desc: The command buffer is committed for execution.

items.name: case completed
items.desc: The command buffer completed execution successfully.

items.name: case error
items.desc: Execution of the command buffer was aborted due to an error during execution.
